tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage Tutorial

definition.text: This tutorial walks you through the implementation of the trading idea defined in the previous tutorial, covering the definitions of the Trigger Stage.

translations.text: Este tutorial le guía a través de la implementación de la idea de trading comercial definida en el tutorial anterior, cubriendo las definiciones de Trigger Stage  (etapa de gatillo).
